# <a name="how-to-find-options-in-outlookcom-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="26b05-102">如何尋找 Outlook.com 設定] 中的選項</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="26b05-102">How to find options in Outlook.com settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="26b05-103">在頁面頂端，選取齒輪圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="26b05-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="26b05-104">若要開啟 [設定]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="26b05-104">to open Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="26b05-105">在 [設定] 窗格底部，選取 [[**檢視所有的 Outlook 設定**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="26b05-105">At the bottom of the Settings pane, select [**View all Outlook settings**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="26b05-106">您一般、 電子郵件、 行事曆，則會顯示 （如果適用） 和進階設定和選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="26b05-106">This will show your General, Email, Calendar, and (if applicable) Premium settings and options.</span></span>
